solution.text:
We know that if the cities were _{j}_ cm apart on the map, they would be 1000km apart. Therefore, using the unitary method:
1 cm \(\Rightarrow \frac{1000}{_{j}_}\) km
Therefore, \(_{{Decimal('1.75')*j}}_ cm \Rightarrow _{{Decimal('1.75')*j}}_ \times \frac{1000}{_{j}_} = 1750 km\)

content.text: You are given a map with a scale of _{j}_cm = 1000km. What is the distance between two places in kilometres, if the distance on the map is _{{Decimal('1.75')*j}}_ cm?
